mapper.select: SELECT cart.check_status as checkStatus,cart.buy_number as buyNumber,cart.mac_id as macId, aisle.id as aisleId, aisle.stock as stock, aisle.price, aisle.product_cat_id as productCatId, product.id as productId,product.name as name,product.materials as materials, product.show_price as showPrice, product.picture as picture, product.unit as unit, product.zs_weight as zsWeight, product.cp_weight as cpWeight, product.warm_flag as warmFlag, product.warm_time as warmTime, product.hot_num as hotNum, product.label as label, product.`status` as status, product.up_time as upTime, date_add(product.up_time, interval period day) as downTime, product.keyword as keyword, product.descr as descr, product.create_time as createTime, (product.`status` = 1 AND date_add(product.up_time, interval period day) > now()) as flag FROM food_shopping_cart AS cart, food_machine_aisle AS aisle left join food_product as product on product.id = aisle.product_id WHERE cart.aisle_id = aisle.id AND cart.mac_id = aisle.mac_id AND cart.product_id = aisle.product_cat_id AND cart.user_id = #{userId}
